en: And they brought in the ark of God, and set it in the midst of the tent that David had pitched for it: and they offered burnt-offerings and peace-offerings before God.
hmr: Chun, Pathien bâwm chu an hung lâk lût a, Davidin a lo siem puon in lailung laitaka chun an inṭhut tah a; chun, Pathien hmaah pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai le inremna thilinhlânhai an inhlân tah a.

en: And when David had made an end of offering the burnt-offering and the peace-offerings, he blessed the people in the name of Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, David chun pumraw- hmang thilinhlân le inremna thilin- hlân chu ân hlân hnung chun, LALPA hmingin mipuihai chu mal a sâwm tah a.

en: And he dealt to every one of Israel, both man and woman, to every one a loaf of bread, and a portion of flesh, and a cake of raisins.
hmr: Chun, Israel mihai mi tin el chu a nuhmei a pasalin, bei tlang le sa tlin le grêp ra ṭâwl a pêk seng a.

en: And he appointed certain of the Levites to minister before the ark of Jehovah, and to celebrate and to thank and praise Jehovah, the God of Israel:
hmr: Chun, Levi mihai mi ṭhenkhat chu LALPA Israelhai Pathien chu inpâka lâwmthu hrila, ama chawi- mawi dingin LALPA bâwm hmaa rawngbâwl hlak ding chun a ruot a;

en: Asaph the chief, and second to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obed-edom, and Jeiel, with psalteries and with harps; and Asaph with cymbals, sounding aloud;
hmr: a hotu tak chu Asaph a na, ama dawta chun Zekaria, Jaaziel, Semira- moth, Jehiel, Mattithia, Eliab, Benaia, Obed-edom le Jeiel hai; ṭingṭang le perkhuong puhai an nih;

en: and Benaiah and Jahaziel the priests with trumpets continually, before the ark of the covenant of God.
hmr: Asaph chu dârbenthek inring- taka sutin; thiempu Benaia le Jahaziel hai chu Pathien thuthlung bâwm hmaa chun tawtawrâwt leh an um zing bawk a.

en: Then on that day did David first ordain to give thanks unto Jehovah, by the hand of Asaph and his brethren.
hmr: Chun, chu ni chun David chun Asaph le a unauhai LALPA hmaa lâwmthu chu inhlân dingin a ruot hmasatak a.

en: O give thanks unto Jehovah, call upon his name; Make known his doings among the peoples.
hmr: Aw, LALPA kuomah lâwmthu hril unla, a hming lam ro; Mi tin lai chun a thil thaw inhriettir ro.

en: Sing unto him, sing praises unto him; Talk ye of all his marvellous works.
hmr: Ama chawimmawiin hla sak unla,ama inpâkin sak ro; A thilmak thaw po po thu hril ro.

en: Glory ye in his holy name; Let the heart of them rejoice that seek Jehovah.
hmr: A hming inthieng chu sawng ro; LALPA zawngtuhai lungril chu hlim raw se.

en: Seek ye Jehovah and his strength; Seek his face evermore.
hmr: LALPA le a hrâtna chu zawng unla, A hmêl chu zawng rawp ro.

en: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done, His wonders, and the judgments of his mouth,
hmr: A thilmak thawhai chu hre zing ro, A thilmakhai le a baua a rorêl suokhai chu:

en: O ye seed of Israel his servant, Ye children of Jacob, his chosen ones.
hmr: Aw, a siehlaw Israel thlahai, Jakob thla, a ithlanghai.

en: He is Jehovah our God; His judgments are in all the earth.
hmr: Ama chu LALPA ei Pathien chu a nih, A rorêlhai chu hnuoi chung po poa hin a um.

en: Remember his covenant for ever, The word which he commanded to a thousand generations,
hmr: A thuthlung chu kumkhuoin hre zing unla, Suon sâng khat chena a thu lo pêk chu.

en: The covenant which he made with Abraham, And his oath unto Isaac,
hmr: Abraham kuoma a thuthlung le, Isak kuoma a inkhâmna chu.

en: And confirmed the same unto Jacob for a statute, To Israel for an everlasting covenant,
hmr: Chu ma chu thuruot ni dingin Jakob kuomah a sukdet a, Israel kuoma kumkhawtluong thuthlung dingin;

en: Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, The lot of your inheritance;
hmr: “Kanaan ram hi i kuomah pêng ka ti che, I rochanpuol ding chu,” tiin.

en: When ye were but a few men in number, Yea, very few, and sojourners in it;
hmr: Mi tlâwmte chau in ni lai khan, Anih, mi tlâwmte chau, chutaka mikhuol in na;

en: And they went about from nation to nation, And from one kingdom to another people.
hmr: Hnam tum tum kuomah an fe lawn an fe lawn a, Ram tum tuma inthawkin mi tum tumhai kuomah.

en: He suffered no man to do them wrong; Yea, he reproved kings for their sakes,
hmr: Tu inêksâwr khawm a phal nawh a. Anih, anni leiin lalhai khawm a kâwk a;

en: Saying, Touch not mine anointed ones, And do my prophets no harm.
hmr: “Ka hriek nâlhai chu tâwk naw unla, Ka zâwlneihai pawi hrim hrim khawm tâwk naw ro,” tiin.

en: Sing unto Jehovah, all the earth; Show forth his salvation from day to day.
hmr: Leihnuoia um po pohai, LALPA chawimawiin hla sak ro, Ni tin a sandamna thu chu inhriettir ro.

en: Declare his glory among the nations, His marvellous works among all the peoples.
hmr: Hnam tin lai chun a ropuizie hril unla, Mi tinrênghai lai chun a thilmak thawhai hril ro.

en: For great is Jehovah, and greatly to be praised: He also is to be feared above all gods.
hmr: LALPA chu a ropui a, nasataka inpâk ding a ni sih a, Ama chu pathien po po nêka ṭi ding a nih.

en: For all the gods of the peoples are idols: But Jehovah made the heavens.
hmr: Mipuihai pathienhai chu milimhai an ni sih a, LALPA ruok chun vânhai khi a siem a nih.

en: Honor and majesty are before him: Strength and gladness are in his place.
hmr: Chawimawina le ropuina a hmaah an um a, Hrâtna le hlimna chu a hmun inthiengah an um.

en: Ascribe unto Jehovah, ye kindreds of the peoples, Ascribe unto Jehovah glory and strength;
hmr: Mi tina chi tinrênghai, LALPA kuomah pe unla, LALPA kuoma chun ropuina le hrâtna pe ro.

en: Ascribe unto Jehovah the glory due unto his name: Bring an offering, and come before him; Worship Jehovah in holy array.
hmr: LALPA kuomah a hming ropui chu pe unla, Thil inhlân ding chawiin, a hmaah hung ro. Aw, inthieng mawina inbelin LALPA chu chibai bûk ro.

en: Tremble before him, all the earth: The world also is established that it cannot be moved.
hmr: Leihnuoia um po pohai, a hmaa chun inthin ro; Khawvêl khawm hi ân hnîng thei nawna dingin sukdetin a um a.

en: Let the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice; And let them say among the nations, Jehovah reigneth.
hmr: Vânhai khi lâwmtakin um sienla, hnuoi khawm hi hlimtakin um raw se; Hnam tin lai chun, “LALPA chu lalah a ṭhung a,” ti ro.

en: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; Let the field exult, and all that is therein;
hmr: Tuisuoriet le a sûnga um po po hi inri hum hum sienla, Lo le a sûnga um po po hi lâwmtakin um raw se.

en: Then shall the trees of the wood sing for joy before Jehovah; For he cometh to judge the earth.
hmr: Chu pha chun ram hnuoia thing po po hi LALPA hmaah hlimin hla sak an tih, Hnuoi ro rêl dingin a hung ding a ni sih a.

en: O give thanks unto Jehovah; for he is good; For his lovingkindness endureth for ever.
hmr: Aw LALPA kuomah lâwmthu hril ro, ama chu a ṭha sih a, A zângaina chu kumkhuoin a um zing sih a.

en: And say ye, Save us, O God of our salvation, And gather us together and deliver us from the nations, To give thanks unto thy holy name, And to triumph in thy praise.
hmr: A kuoma chun, “Aw Pathien, nang kan sandamna, mi sandam la, Nangin mi ṭhuoi khâwmin,hnamhai laia inthawk chun mi sanhim la, I hming inthieng kuoma lâwmthu hril ding le, Nangma inpâknaa chawimawi ding in,” ti ro.

en: Blessed be Jehovah, the God of Israel, From everlasting even to everlasting. And all the people said, Amen, and praised Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA Israelhai Pathien chu inpâkin um raw se. Chatuona inthawka chatuon chenin. Chun, mipui po po chun, “Amen,” an lo tih a, LALPA an inpâk tah a.

en: So he left there, before the ark of the covenant of Jehovah, Asaph and his brethren, to minister before the ark continually, as every day’s work required;
hmr: Chun, ni tina sin ṭûlzie ang peia rawngbâwl zing zing dingin, Asaph le a unauhai chu LALPA thuthlungna bâwm hmaa chun a sie tah a;

en: and Obed-edom with their brethren, threescore and eight; Obed-edom also the son of Jeduthun and Hosah to be doorkeepers;
hmr: Obed-edom le an unauhai sâwmruk le pariet hai leh; Jeduthun naupa Obed-edom le Hosa chu kawtkhâr vêngtuhai ni dingin;

en: and Zadok the priest, and his brethren the priests, before the tabernacle of Jehovah in the high place that was at Gibeon,
hmr: chun, thiempu Zadok le a unau thiempuhai chu Gibeon bâwlhmuna chun, LALPA biekbûk hmaa chun an um a,

en: to offer burnt-offerings unto Jehovah upon the altar of burnt-offering continually morning and evening, even according to all that is written in the law of Jehovah, which he commanded unto Israel;
hmr: Israelhai kuoma thu a pêk tah, LALPA dâna in ziek ang po po ang taka zîngtieng le zântieng tina, pumrawhmanga mâichâma pumraw- hmang thilinhlân chu LALPA hmaa inhlân dingin;

en: and with them Heman and Jeduthun, and the rest that were chosen, who were mentioned by name, to give thanks to Jehovah, because his lovingkindness endureth for ever;
hmr: chun, an kuoma chun Heman hai, Jeduthun hai, an hming lama thlanga umhai chu, a zângaina chu kumkhuoin a um zing leia LALPA chu lâwmthu hril dingin an um a;

en: and with them Heman and Jeduthun with trumpets and cymbals for those that should sound aloud, and with instruments for the songs of God; and the sons of Jeduthun to be at the gate.
hmr: anni laia Heman le Jeduthun chu, ân ring zing ding dârbenthek le tawtawrâwt le chun an um a; Pathien hlahai sakna dinga hlasakna thuom- hnaw kim le chun, chun, Jeduthun naupasalhai chu dai kawtkhâra um ding an nih.

en: And all the people departed every man to his house: and David returned to bless his house.
hmr: Chun, mi po po chu mâni in seng- ah an ṭîn tah a; David khawm chu a in- sûng chu mal sâwm dingin a ṭîn tah a.
